actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to require adequate compensation for owner-operator fuel costs in a transportation emergency.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to prescribe regulations with respect to the use by motor carriers of motor vehicles not owned by them to insure that the party responsible for the purchase of fuel is adequately compensated by the terms of the lease or contract for fuel costs in the event a transportation emergency either exists or is anticipated.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Interstate Commerce Commission to require adequate compensation for owner-operator fuel costs in a transportation emergency.
